Posts.Content: I was recently diagnosed with breast cancer and will be having the tumor removed May 31. I'm a bit concerned about the whole thing. Any one to share some positive news?
Posts.Title: What can I expect?

Posts.Content: Hi Judy. I will be having the same procedure done and they will be inserting a drain tube, which kind of freaks me out. I too am right handed so I will be hurting to and I will try not to be lifting my arm up. I feel bad that my partner will, once again, have to be helping me with quite a lot. Thanks for the feedback.
Posts.Title: What can I expect?
